page.title: 13A PARTICULAR DAY 24.6.1985
page.content: A particular Monday for a ten year old girl. I woke up at{8.15 a.m.}and got dressed. I washed my hands and face, then had some Coco Pops with cream off the milk. My mum did my hair. At about {8.40 a.m.}I went down the lane to my Nanna's to say bye bye because she's going on holiday in Corfu. When I got to school I took my coat off, changed my shoes and went into our class. The fourth years were going to London with our teacher, so we had to go into Mrs.Lyon's class. At playtime I got my tuck from the tuck shop, then played tick with Donna and Laura. After break we did some writing then we had dinner at{12.00 noon.}After dinner I played sevens against the wall with a ball. After dinner play we did some work sheets with Mrs.Screaton. We went home at{3.15 p.m.}I walked down the yard to groom my pony Dinkie,then home to tea.
